entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning late in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 23 January 2023
